api.adapter.em.tacker module¶

class api.adapter.em.tacker.TackerEmAdapter(auth_url=None, username=None, password=None, identity_api_version=None, project_name=None, project_domain_name=None, user_domain_name=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class of functions that map the ETSI standard operations exposed by the EM to the operations exposed by the OpenStack Tacker client management driver.
